info.task: navigate to next column from cel containing link in grid
info.title: Navigate to the next column from a cell containing a link in a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstLinkedCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third cell of the second row in the grid

user: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the next column in the grid.
instructions.raw: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the next column in the grid.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Amount') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('$1,000,000.00') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 4, row 2) are conveyed
